response.answer_text: Basically the durability and life of any laptop depends on the usage like the purpose of the usage as well as the configuration and the quality of the productSo the life of laptop is directly dependent on the usageevery laptop has its pros and consthings to be considered while selecting a laptoppurpose or needbudgetspecifications according to your purposeresearch or investigation about the laptop from friends circle or internetsuitability of the product for your purposeprice analysis of different marketplaces so that you can get product at least price availableTHANKS FOR READING

If you are asking which laptop is most likely to last the most years before its performance loses most of its usefulness, you probably are looking at a MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, or a MacBook. If you are asking which laptop is most likely to last the most hours before it needs to be charged, you probably are looking at a MacBook Air.
